name: Mission Impractical
description:
Museum theft but with confetti cannons, power drills, and expensive machinery. Be careful who sees you or your tools, as playing too risky will mean an end to your plans. However, who wants to take the boring way out?

Controls:

Arrow Keys/WASD - Move

X/E - Steal

Z/R - Hide

Made for the MashUp Game Jam 2. I definitely overscoped on this one lol
